at.ac.tuwien.pointnerreisinger.ballonbote

Class MoveableObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.pointnerreisinger.ballonbote.MoveableObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Actor, Background, Obstacle

    public abstract class MoveableObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Combines all moving Objects
    Author:
    Michael Pointner
